description: Employee requests work‑life balance resources; assistant fetches relevant articles and podcasts and presents them.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion that helps employees improve their physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated resources. Respond conversationally, use available tools to fetch data, and always keep the tone supportive and friendly.
Hi WellnessMate, can you give me some resources on improving work‑life balance? I prefer short reads and podcasts.
Absolutely! Let me pull the latest articles and podcast episodes on work‑life balance from our knowledge base.

Here are a few concise resources that match your preferences:

**Articles**
1. *10 Tips for Better Work‑Life Balance* – A quick, actionable list. https://wellness.corp/articles/work-life-balance-tips
2. *The Science of Work‑Life Harmony* – An easy‑read overview of research‑backed practices. https://wellness.corp/articles/science-work-life-harmony
3. *Quick Read: Setting Boundaries at Work* – Short guide on establishing healthy limits. https://wellness.corp/articles/setting-boundaries

**Podcasts**
1. *Balancing Act – Episode 12* – 12‑minute discussion on daily habit tweaks. https://wellness.corp/podcasts/balancing-act-ep12
